m_szDocTitle: Honda will move beyond hydrogen fuel cells with its Clarity line | Hydrogen Fuel News
m_szDocSumamry: Share on Tumblr Automaker is bringing more vehicles to the Clarity line that will be environmentally friendly Japanese automaker Honda has plans to expand beyond hydrogen fuel cells with its Clarity line of vehicles. The company has plans to launch its next generation Clarity Fuel Cell Vehicle later this year, but will also be introducing a new electric vehicles and hybrid Clarity model in 2017. The all-electric version of this vehicle is expected to make its first appearance in the commercial market next year, though it will likely have a limited release.
